main event: A round object was sighted from Washington National Airport, described as similar to a bright star or aircraft light.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 40 minutes to 1 hour., The object moved slowly towards the horizon before disappearing., Multiple reliable witnesses included airline pilots and control tower operators., The object was observed at various elevations and azimuths by different witnesses., This sighting had no physical evidence or photographs.
witness description: airline pilots and control tower operators considered reliable
